Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Body: Do you use smart contracts? For what tasks and what technology are they created?

Author: gccigng
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Smart contracts are created on the Ethereum blockchain using the language of Solidity. They are needed to conduct transactions, conclude an agreement with a trader or asset manager, as well as to pay salaries to experts.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: gccigng
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Trade traders can lead on different exchanges. Agreement with the user in the form of a smart contract. When a trader publishes a portfolio on the stock exchange and confirms the start of working with him, information appears on the platform.

First you are a beginner, then an amateur and then you can grow to an expert. Rating depends on the number of publications.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Risks in any investment projects are the same and these are competitors. However, Taklimakan platform is already a finished product. This is not a stage of crowdfunding, so that you can fear that the project will not raise enough funds to work. All that you risk is a long-term expectation of a rise in the price of a token. And they will grow as the team conducts burning tokens once a month, and there are already about 8,500 users and their number will only grow, strengthening the token’s position in the market.

Author: amposed
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Rating is not only a reflection of how much content you publish. But it also takes into account relationships with other users, whether you have subscribers and referrals. This affects whether you can post content for payment.

Author: amposed
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Yes, and what interests me, if I publish material in English, can I myself translate it into Russian and propose a second publication? Will it count as one or different activities?

Author: toleomasd
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Of course they are different. You spend your time to make the material available to readers from different countries. And publications for each language must be done separately.

Author: uspetike
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If this is allowed, then it turns out that specialists can receive more tokens, for a simple adaptive of their analysis for different countries? Is it fair?

Author: toleomasd
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Why not? For analysts, the articles will still be checked by moderators, because a simple translation from Google translator will not work. You want to do several languages, then own them well to write

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: gleilsonsilva
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: And what rewards are there? How long does it take to start making good money?

Author: uspetike
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: sutetrez
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: sethelfor
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: tasedijers
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

But it is possible because the whole Taklimakan platform is dedicated to cryptocurrency, investment, blockchain, and the training course will be more profitable to receive here, along with admission to news and analytical materials, which will immediately help to use theoretical knowledge in practice

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

But in general, experienced users can offer their articles and lessons to add to the curriculum, as I heard

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: uspetike
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I just can’t understand users who are blogging how they can monetize articles. After all, they do not write analytical materials. And surely there must be a certain level of platform confidence before paying monetization. I would like to post my materials with pleasure, but I can’t figure it out.

Author: onchoys
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

But if Taklimakan developers made some privileges for them, then this would violate the concept of equal opportunities for all users.

Author: ralosted
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: gleilsonsilva
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The concept of the project that brings together all lovers and professionals of the crypto industry. This is something new. Now they like to divide more into groups than to unite. Do you plan to conduct project presentations in foreign countries, for example, Russia?

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: sethelfor
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I did not have time to participate in the token sale and bounty, but if I buy  tokens, I want to know, how can I increase my income by owning taklimakan tokens?

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: sethelfor
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: gleilsonsilva
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan educational courses can even be integrated into a university study program. I think students appreciated the opportunity to learn the basis of cryptocurrency trading. Maybe you already thought about such a joint program?

Author: uspetike
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I think these ideas are among the leadership of the universities of Kazakhstan. After all, they recently held a lecture with university students. Perhaps this is the first step in the future to agree on cooperation. Taklimakan platform has all the available resources, including theoretical materials, lectures and webinars, to make possible full-scale distance learning. Haha, even I would be happy to study with them

Author: darnekleo
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I like the fact that your platform is not only focused on providing graphs about the situation in the market, but there is also expert analysis. This greatly simplifies the development of information. But the road map could be described more detailed. For example, when do you plan to start downloading lectures?

Author: onchoys
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I think you understand that lectures are not the most important part of the platform. At first I believe the team will release the remaining tools and functions for analysis and trading, and then they will gradually improve and fill the education section.

Author: darnekleo
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Perhaps you `re right. I have another question, do I need to pass KYC verification? For participants of the token of sale it is obligatory, but if you register now, what then?

Author: onchoys
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If you plan to use the main features of the platform as a simple user, then no. But if you plan to publish paid content for a block of analytics, trading, etc., then verification will be required.

Author: ditrore
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What is required from users who would like to sell their services on your platform?

Author: sutetrez
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: You can offer your services as an analyst, blogger, manager, trader, etc. Read about the capabilities of the platform on the site or in a white paper.

Author: ditrore
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I am interested in opportunities to provide freelance services. The site mentioned that it will be possible to create your portfolio, but I haven’t met clear information anymore.

Author: sutetrez
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I understand that not all the opportunities  of the taklimakan are clearly displayed in the documents. I think it takes time for the team to tell more. Try to write them on email

Author: sethelfor
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hi guys. I like that the team maintains an honest dialogue with users. Good indicator for the community. How can a user earn points when creating content? What is considered in the rating?

Author: ralosted
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: So there are various factors that the rating depends on such as: how you actively communicate in discussions, what content you provide, how many subscribers. I think even likes of other users also appreciate the value of your information or comment

Author: sethelfor
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Yes, intuitively, I understand that this is how it works. But I would like to see specific indicators, how many ratings you need to score, so that you can monetize content. I would also like to know how much information that is published on the platform will be available on other resources. Or content does not go beyond the platform, which raises its uniqueness?

Author: ralosted
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: There is no data on the system of ratings and monetization. I saw that even now you can share any article on social networks. On the other hand, when adding a post, the user decides whether the article will be available only to subscribers, available to all or only to all users, but within the Taklimakan platform.

Author: toleomasd
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Probably for the most valuable articles it is better to limit accessibility to the platform if you want your subscriber list to grow like your rating.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Does it make sense to start adding content right now, until the platform is fully developed, I probably can not find subscribers?

Author: darnekleo
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: so far there are not too many users on the Taklimakan, but you can already start working on your rating. Because the subscription system is already active and you can find yourself readers. And the more subscribers, the more likely you will be able to start earning

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: toleomasd
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

On taklimakan, you can see and rate fluctuations and expert reviews. Trading strategies are especially good. It helps not to make hasty decisions, but to act thoughtfully.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I usually participated more in bounty programs. Is there something in that direction?

Author: toleomasd
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The bounty promotion is over, but if you write well, you can start your blog. Get subscribers and be able to monetize. There are a lot of directions on taklimakan, how to make money.

Author: sutetrez
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The possibility of monetization, in my opinion, makes the taklimakan unique. There is not enough qualitative analysis of the crypto market, and you can’t prepare good materials for free. So do not waste time, register and start pumping your karma. This is better than posting articles on different sites, as you have to do with bounty.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If you look at the materials, then articles in English and Russian are best adapted. Consultations will probably be held in writing, so a simple translation service will help you if it is not at all clear. But the language barrier is better to look for which users have good status and communicate in your language.

I just read that some services will be available with a certain number of tokens, and I have few of them. And I could transfer them to a friend, so that in the amount was enough to activate the services

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: roluedev
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Well now the trading strategies of the article you can watch for free. But further for the use of ready-made solutions that experts offer will be charged a commission. It is understandable, if you want a really tested and working idea, be ready to make a contribution.

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: This is TAN. Smart contract of TKLN token has been repeatedly cloned. One of these fakes was added to the Yobit exchange, thereby affecting the price drop of the original token. This is one of the reasons why Taklimakan Network was swap TKLN token to TAN token. More information about this can be found here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2426759.msg48846557#msg48846557

Author: tasedijers
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Yes, I do not mind paying. The main thing is that more experts come to the platform. When will all functions be planned and will the mobile version be released?

Author: roluedev
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The team has not yet announced, but I think soon. Now they have become very active, chat added, system of evaluation and repost, tools. I think everything is moving towards the final release.

Author: amposed
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

In this regard, Taklimakan has a more intuitive design and I can see specifically where to watch the news, and where to trade strategies. The idea of such portals is not new, but I personally like the implementation of this project.

But what I like about the taklimakan platform is that you can conveniently create a list of subscriptions to news, analytics, or even blogs of specific traders. Maybe later I'll try the referral program, 5% bonus is not a small profit, especially when retailers appear and you can buy goods right here.

Author: unionmare
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The trading signals indicate the vision of the traders who publish those signals. The general parameters include the take profit, stop loss figures, which might provide the general direction of the trade and when to exit it. We do recommend to look at historical hit and miss of trading signals posted by the trader and compare the current signals with other signals on the platform. In the end of the day, trading is solely your decision.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Some good news about the development of the project from the Taklimakan Network team: "Dear community, We always happy to hear your feedback and suggestions for improvements. One aspect that we have been working hard recently is listing on top cryptocurrency exchange. Today, we are delighted to announce that our token have been selected be listed on Top 30 exchange in the world. The name of exchange is CoinTiger (cointiger.com), which is based in Singapore. That exchange has proven track history of high daily volume (over 100 mln. USD as of 22/12/18) on various pairs, which will ensure low liquidity risk for our token holders. The selection process was tough, since exchange accepts only high quality projects, with clear tokenomics and active community. Listing on CoinTiger is a part of our designated exchange listing strategy, which would beneficially affect token holders of our project.  Exact listing and deposit dates to be announced soon, though we expect that all procedures to finish and settle in Q1 2019."   Do not forget that Taklimakan Network swaps TKLN token to TAN token! 21.01.2019 10:00 UTC Will make a snapshot. After the swap, the TKLN token will be deactivated! More info about this here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2426759.msg48846557#msg48846557

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Information from the team about reduce the emission of token and its utility:  TAN token burn strategy  Taklimakan Network plans to periodically burn TAN tokens in the amount of 50% of the net profit received. Token burn will be carried out up to a maximum threshold of 90% of the total emissions. In the end, only 100,000,000 TAN tokens will be left in circulation.  About TAN Token  The TAN token is developed on the Ethereum platform using ERC20 standard. The initial issue is 1.000.000.000 TAN, and additional release is not possible.  The TAN Token is a means of payment within the framework of the Taklimakan Network platform. Payment for all services of the platform, access to paid subscriptions of analytical materials and market signals, educational courses and individual consultations is carried out by the TAN token. Also, the platform token is the only means of paying commission fees for additional services and advice provided through the platform. Every holder of TAN tokens has the right to vote for an analytical tool or innovation the implementation of which he sees as necessary.  Since all the main services and commissions of the platform are paid in TAN tokens, company's income is calculated in TAN tokens.  Follow us for more updates!

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello crypto community!  By participating in Taklimakan Network's Airdrop activity you can get project tokens for free. Taklimakan Network is the new generation social network connecting the crypto community of the whole world. It is an unique, convenient and easy-to-use tool for beginners as well as for professionals of various fields.  Follow the https://t.me/taklimakannetworkairdropbot link and get your TAN tokens.

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The developers of the Taklimakan  invite you to visit and evaluate the platform. In addition, you can get tokens TAN for registration on the platform, if you take part in the AIRDROP using the link above.  Dear beloved community!  Today is the notable day in the cryptocurrency market history! The efforts that we all put together, all the hard work, desire and belief have finally been resulted in the beta version release of the most waited platform in this industry!  We have been through all the ups and downs that market brought in the last 2 years. But the true dedication and trust into the ideas implemented, gave us the extra power to make it happen. There were both supporters and haters over the development period, we made mistakes and we stood up again, but did not want to let down our community and friends.  Without getting into too much details, Taklimakan Network have transformed to the multi-functional social network for both crypto enthusiasts and people not familiar with the industry. Taklimakan is the rocket that breaks limits and takes only progressive and like-minded people on-board.  Our main objective is to gather all of our beloved believers and make their journey as smooth and convenient as possible. Read, share, get new knowledge, find friends, gain popularity, prosper and make this world better!  Round of applauds for all of us!  Have a good day and see you at Taklimakan Network! https://taklimakan.network

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Guys, before going to the exchanger, the team gives the last chance to exchange the TKLN for TAN. Do not miss it!!!  Dear community!  First of all, we want to thank everyone for supporting Taklimakan Network platform and being patient about the listing date.  At the beginning of the year we have announced that our token was chosen for listing on Cointiger (TOP 30 exchange) in the first quarter of this year. We are pleased to announce that the listing of TAN token will occur on March 28, 2019 and the deposit will be opened from March 27, 2019!  Also, participants of the airdrop and bounty campaigns from the last year, who did not have a time to fill out the relevant google forms are given the last chance to send a request for a tokenswap at support@taklimakan.io till 25th March. After that date, the distribution of TAN tokens will begin and all subsequent requests for tokenswap will be rejected.  The request must specify: 1. ERC-20 wallet address with TKLN tokens. 2. Email used for participation in the relevant campaign. 3. Indication of which campaign you participated in (airdrop or bounty).  Stay tuned for new updates!

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hi guys, check out some updates on the Taklimakan  platform:  Hello community!  Today we want to shed light on the upcoming update that will bring a lot of interesting things to our platform.  The update will include the following: 1. Adding the "Cryptomarket" section . In this section you will find general information about the cryptocurrency market, coins and tokens. The information in this section will help you understand the general condition of the market, how the total market capitalization is formed and how to conduct a comparative analysis of cryptocurrencies.  2. Adding functionality "Chats". This feature will allow platform users to create personal and thematic group chats, as well as chats inside publications.  3. Adding functionality "Payment system". With the addition of this feature, users will be able to add a personal ERC-20 address to their profile, make purchases and pay for paid subscriptions to service providers. All of this can be done using TAN token.  This update will be released in early April!  Stay tuned!

Author: scolary23
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The Taklimakan Network  team decided to make a swap.                                         Taklimakan Network swaps TKLN token to TAN token! The main reasons for swapping tokens are as following:   1. Many irrelevant functions will be excluded in TAN tokens, such as: double spending, ICO operation functions, toggleTransfers. Removing these functions will reduce transaction gas costs.   2. Smart contract of TKLN token has been repeatedly cloned. One of these fakes was added to the Yobit exchange, thereby affecting the price drop of the original token.   3. Many participants of bounty and airdrop campaigns were scammers. By creating fake accounts in various social networks and completing tasks they have received tokens. Consequently, they began to transfer them from multiple wallets to one and sold them at a greatly reduced price. But thanks to the blockchain's transparency, our monitoring system found those fraudsters who violated the rules of participation and suggested us to double-check all bounty / airdrop participants before sending them a TAN token. This measure would benefit true token holders and honest bounty / airdrop campaigners.  Conditions for obtaining TAN tokens:   21.01.2019 10:00 UTC We will make a snapshot. All token holders must have TKLN on their own ERC-20 wallets. If you have TKLN tokens on BitNaru exchange, you might withdraw them to ERC 20 compatible wallet or keep them on exchange balance. TAN tokens will be distributed accordingly. Then, in a few days, TAN tokens will be sent in the equivalent of 1: 1 (1 TKLN = 1 TAN). We will also preserve the TAN emission equivalent to the current TKLN emission.  Conditions for obtaining TAN tokens to bounty and airdrop campaigners:   In order to exchange TKLN token for a TAN token the token holder must fill in a google-form before 19.01.2019. Those who do not fill out the form will not receive new tokens, therefore we ask everyone to treat it with complete seriousness and understanding.  The form for the participants of the Bounty campaign - https://goo.gl/T6B4xh The form for the participants of the Airdrop campaign - https://goo.gl/35GZ6A  After the swap, the TKLN token will be deactivated!  Thank you for your attention, you can send any relevant questions to support@taklimakan.io

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Current listing fees on major crypto exchanges are ridiculously high, whilst listing on small exchanges with no liquidity possess high reputational and investment risks for our token holders. Hence, to assure listing on major crypto exchanges the soft cap amount would not be sufficient, considering product development and marketing costs. Moreover, according to our marketing strategy we would like to expand our product globally from initial stage. At the current stance, we have over 100 000 committed users of the platform, but to fuel our ample ambitions this number will be not sufficient. We are aiming to attract at least 1 mln users in the short term and certainly that might possess high marketing and product development costs.

Body: Hello! Tell us briefly what your project will be useful for users and what are the advantages for the holders of the tokens?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.The TKLN is a utility token, it is not a share or security of any kind, no equity, interests or dividends will ever be distributed or assigned to TKLN holders from the company.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We believe that investment should be based on knowledge, experience, analysis and the use of trading tools. TAKLIMAKAN NETWORK is an investment and an educational business platform which gives an opportunity for the users to increase their level of literacy in the crypto industry and to learn practical trading skills. The main goal of the Taklimakan Network founders is to create a community of experts. Our platform will connect the leading cryptoanalysts, experienced crypto investors with beginners and give them the necessary tools to bring the crypto market to a new level.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.The TKLN is a utility token, it is not a share or security of any kind, no equity, interests or dividends will ever be distributed or assigned to TKLN holders from the company. Taklimakan does not guarantee any income or profit from TKLN tokens because TKLN tokens are only intended to be used within Taklimakan Network and do not have any value beyond it. Taklimakan does not in any way whatsoever guarantee any income or profit from Taklimakan services and Taklimakan Network.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: As traders make trading decisions, the platform will automatically query information about these decisions from the exchange and publish for the investors. Investors will not see all decisions made by the trader, but only decisions related to the portfolios they are invested in. In order to protect a trading secret, trader's decisions will only be published after they have executed on the market. If a decision is canceled, it will not be published.

Author: ofen
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: How do you ensure protection for the token owners?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: A user account will be protected by two-factor authentication with a strong password(2FA is out of scope for MVP). All users need to identify themselves by going through the KYC procedure in order to receive TKLN tokens.

Author: childOfFrance
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! I didn't understand what crowd prediction is. What is that?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: One of the main goals of the platform is to securely connect traders with investors by allowing traders to manage invested funds. First, traders will be able to customize and publish crypto asset management offer on their personal page. Once trader published their offer or multiple offers, investors will be able to find them on the Asset and Fund Management trader search page. If investors like a trading offer, they may choose to invest. The investment process begins with acceptance of management offer. After the management offer is accepted, it becomes management agreement, an investor needs to transfer funds from investor wallet to the wallet that is controlled by the platform. Funds may be transferred within dates defined in management offer.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Author: honba
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: I expect this project will be prosperous! Absorbing plan, consistent project, very great logo.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan Network - a platform that allows any user, who registered an account as an investor, trader, analyst or asset manager, to earn in and out the platform ecosystem. In more detail, consider three cases of interaction between platform users: 1)Investor - Trader. The investor can successfully trade and multiply his capital, by basing his decisions on the recommendations of the traders. The trader receives the proceeds from investors who follow his trading recommendations. 2)Investor - Analyst. An investor can successfully invest and increase his capital by relying on the analysis provided. The analyst receives proceeds from investors for providing professional reports and reviews. 3)Investor - Asset Manager. The investor can successfully receive passive income by putting his capital in the trust management. The trust manager gets the opportunity to receive a constant stream of earnings by attracting capital from investors in the trust management

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on their accounts.The TKLN is a utility token, it is not a share or security of any kind, no equity, interests or dividends will ever be distributed or assigned to TKLN holders from the company. Taklimakan does not guarantee any income or profit from TKLN tokens because TKLN tokens are only intended to be used within Taklimakan Network and do not have any value beyond it. Taklimakan does not in any way whatsoever guarantee any income or profit from Taklimakan services and Taklimakan Network.

Author: fedorh31p
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What's your technology stack for fund management microservice?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Information handled by this service is highly sensitive, so data integrity for this microservice is prioritized over performance. For this reason SQL database will be preferred for data storage, and Python or C# will be chosen for the reason of integration simplicity.

Author: vicklank
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Are you sure in proper functioning of smart contracts?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Blockchain smart contracts are developed in a recent version of Solidity language, the version is fixed to prevent incompatibilities. Unit testing is done in NodeJS using Truffle framework. That's why we're sure that our smart contracts will function properly.

Author: vicklank
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Why did you decide to test in NodeJS using Truffle framework?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The main reasoning behind the test framework choice was to prevent copy paste when writing unit tests, as well as avoid limitations of test sizes

Author: akafcka
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What's your technology solution for trading tools microservice?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Trading Tools require high data integrity and high computational performance. This microservice will require high CPU and RAM capacity, as well as SQL database for data storage. The load on the microservice is considered to be high, so the application will be developed in C# or Python with certain high performance modules developed in unmanaged C++, possibly with use of GPU computing power.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Where can I find out more about backend of your portal?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Our backend components can be divided in 2 main groups : blockchain contracts and containerized cloud microservices. Blockchain smart contracts are deployed to Ethereum blockchain and reside there during their lifecycle. Containerized cloud microservices are deployed into a cloud infrastructure provided by a 3rd party as IaaS, utilize its services such as databases, and scale on demand.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Moderators request the cost of services of users in USD. Then the value is converted into TKLN tokens according to the current exchange rate of tokens to the USD. Thus, you send and accept payments in amounts of TKLN equivalent to USD prices.

Author: TornadoMv
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What problems do you solve?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: 1)The young, not yet established market of cryptocurrency is not always amenable to technical analysis. Sometimes even a professional trader with an experience cannot determine the medium-term direction and not even the short-term trajectory. 2)Financial education, as well as practice in trading, are prerequisite and necessary for professional trading in with cryptocurrencies. It is required to understand and capture the favorable and unfavorable situation on the market before entering into a directional trade. 3)With the inflow of a large number of people interested in cryptocurrency, a lot of low-quality and fraudulent services appeared in the market offering trading signals, participation in pumps and dumps and in the asset management. As a rule, they mostly do not provide stability and sometimes even lead to the loss of funds. 4)Technical features and inferiority of young and still developing cryptocurrency exchanges, cause certain inconveniences in the trading.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: IMPORTANT ANNOUNCEMENT Dear community members of Taklimakan Network. First of all, we would like to express our great gratitude for your sincere interest and cooperation with our project. We truly appreciate it and want to preserve that close relations with our community going forward. We are happy to announce that soft cap of 5 mln USD has been reached during the main sale stage through your contributions to our project. We would like to congratulate all of you for such a great milestone that we accomplished together!  One more thing you might love to hear is that Alpha version of our product would be announced in the next couple of days with superior updates from demo version. Step by step, we are approaching to build absolutely unique and niche product for crypto markets. After long discussions and negotiations with team members and taking into account renewed strategy of our business, we came to the conclusion that main sale stage should be extended till the end of August. The reasons behind this decision is as follows: • As some of you might be aware current listing fees on major crypto exchanges are ridiculously high, whilst listing on small exchanges with no liquidity possess high reputational and investment risks for our token holders. Hence, to assure listing on major crypto exchanges the soft cap amount would not be sufficient, considering product development and marketing costs. • Moreover, according to our marketing strategy we would like to expand our product globally from initial stage. At the current stance, we have over 100 000 committed users of the platform, but to fuel our ample ambitions this number will be not sufficient. We are aiming to attract at least 1 mln users in the short term and certainly that might possess high marketing and product development costs.    Considering above facts and current market situation, we decided to reduce our hard cap to 17.5 mln USD, whilst tokens equivalent to 10 mln USD (200 mln TKLN tokens) would be kept in reserve fund for attracting new users to the platform and to compensate most active users. We would like to be transparent with our community and respect your opinion. Therefore, to keep it fair, we are glad to announce 20% bonus tokens for all token holders invested to our project during pre-sale and main sale stages. All payments from user who did not pass KYC will be refunded and payments to airdrop and bounty holders will be distributed within 2 weeks. If you have any questions, please contact support@taklimakan.io Thanks for your understanding and believe in our project. We are happy that we reached a great milestone of soft cap with assistance of our community. But given the ambitions and necessity of the project in this market we would love to bring it to the new heights together with you. Stay tuned!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! Yes, sure   1)     Aug – Sep’ 17  Start of work on the project     • Analysis of the market and its problems  • Concept and idea development  • Forming project development strategy  • Forming the core team of the project  • Whitepaper: start of work Forming a strategy that solves the problems of e-commerce     2)         Oct – Nov ’ 17  Research of industry and problems     • Development of MVP  • Presentation to investors  • Marketing Campaign Platform  • Closed pre-sale  • Work on Whitepaper and project packaging     3)    Dec – Jan ’ 18  Public Pre-sale     • Marketing campaign of the Project  • Taklimakan Network creation  • Engaging first experts and analysts     4)     Feb –Mar ’ 18  Development and expansion     • Platform development  • Finding partnerships with media resources  • Forming the digital library  • Working with the community     5)     Apr – Jun ’ 18  Token Sale     • Alpha version release  • Development of an internal scoring system  • International expansion     6)     Jun – Sep ’ 18  Beta Version Release     • Running at full operational capacities  • Involving experts on the website  • Developing a mobile application     7)     Aug – Dec ’ 18  Engaging New Users   • Mobile app beta version   • Global marketing campaign

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Internal Payment System will utilize IPS smart contract as a blockchain transaction ledger. Smart contract will record off-chain receipt ID with off-chain transaction data hash. We will use strongest hash algorithms such as salted MD5 or SHA-512. This will guarantee data integrity of transactional data stored in off-chain database.

Author: anigmaman
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Can you please describe the principle of asset and fund management?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: One of the main goals of the platform is to securely connect traders with investors by allowing traders to manage invested funds. First, traders will be able to customize and publish crypto asset management offer on their personal page. Once trader published their offer or multiple offers, investors will be able to find them on the Asset and Fund Management trader search page. If investors like a trading offer, they may choose to invest. The investment process begins with acceptance of management offer. After the management offer is accepted, it becomes management agreement, an investor needs to transfer funds from investor wallet to the wallet that is controlled by the platform. Funds may be transferred within dates defined in management offer.

Author: anigmaman
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What will happen if the trust manager collects more or fewer funds than planned?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If the maximum cap is reached before the investment end date, the investment stage is closed and no more funds will be accepted. After investment dates close, investment evaluation happens: If the minimum cap is not reached, funds are returned to investors with no trader commission charged. If the minimal cap is reached, trader may begin trading operations at the trading start date. Some terms in management agreement are automatically enforced by the platform. For example “Cash in if portfolio drawback becomes greater than 10%.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Can I find out more about backend of your portal?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Our backend components can be divided in 2 main groups : blockchain contracts and containerized cloud microservices. Blockchain smart contracts are deployed to Ethereum blockchain and reside there during their lifecycle. Containerized cloud microservices are deployed into a cloud infrastructure provided by a 3rd party as IaaS, utilize its services such as databases, and scale on demand.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TN Crypto 100 Index, it is composed of the 100 of the largest cryptocurrencies by market capitalization. By creating an index with 100 components we aim to represent the movement of the broader market and at the same time create a benchmark, ie a reference point, that we could measure investment performance, volatility, etc. against. TN Crypto 100 index that is represented on the website is also a part of platform, which can be checked within a demo version available now. At the same time we have created a Market Return parameter which is derived from the return from the TN Crypto 100 Market Index that we can use for analytical values calculation.

Author: zontik232
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What risks does your project have?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: There are many risks, and unfortunately we cannot influence many of them. Smart contracts, as a new technology, can lead to significant operational, technological, regulatory, reputational and financial risks. Blockchain is a new technology in some jurisdictions and might be subject to regulation and be the cause of any restrictive laws and regulations. It is possible that this may lead to the need to adjust the work of the company in such jurisdictions. Funds raised on the ICO are not insured. In case of loss or loss of value, there is no private or public insurance representative to which investor can apply. But we have experienced team, and we'll do whatever it takes to lead our project to success .

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: How can I use TKLN inside the platform?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on their accounts.

TAKLIMAKAN NETWORK is an investment and an educational business platform which gives an opportunity for the users to increase their level of literacy in the crypto industry and to learn practical trading skills. Our platform will connect the leading crypto analysts, experienced crypto investors with beginners and give them the necessary tools to bring the crypto market to a new level.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: As traders make trading decisions, the platform will automatically query information about these decisions from the exchange and publish for the investors. Investors will not see all decisions made by the trader, but only decisions related to the portfolios they are invested in. In order to protect a trading secret, trader's decisions will only be published after they have executed on the market. If a decision is canceled, it will not be published.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan Network is a platform designed to improve the professional level and success of crypto investors grounded by the experience of experts. This project will operate as a business platform for effective interaction between newcomers of cryptomarket, professional traders, analysts and asset managers. Extensive functionality, variety of investment tools and services with an easy-to-understand and user-friendly interface will be featured in the project. The Taklimakan Network platform enables individual not only to be a project investor but also to receive the information that might be useful in their investment activity. We don't think that 27,5 mln is too much)

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Listing our tokens on Yobit is a scam!  Be careful.  We want to warn you about the fraudulent activities which periodically occurs on the Yobit crypto exchange. Taklimakan Network’s ICO main sale started on 9th of April and will continue for 2 months. On 27th of April we were surprised to see that our token was already added to the Yobit crypto exchange. They put an official post on their twitter account announcing that our token and other tokens like Binance (BNB), LAMBO (LAMBO) and Loom Network (LOOM) are listed on their exchange.   Subsequently, we have appealed to the support service of Yobit crypto exchange, but the answer was never received. On 8th of May the active trade with TKLN tokens began with a daily volume of 127 BTC and a total issue of 1 billion. All our tokens were allegedly transferred to this exchange and were traded at price tens of times cheaper than the price for ICO.  We declare that the Yobit crypto exchange, or someone else, has created a duplicate of our smart contract and has released TKLN fake tokens that cannot be used in the Taklimakan Network ecosystem and accordingly our original tokens cannot be launched on Yobit.  The address of the original Taklimakan Token Smart Contract (TKLN) is 0x0675DAa94725A528b05A3A88635C03EA964BFA7E  We officially declare that our token is not traded on any exchanges and the sale of tokens is made only on the ICO at the moment. In connection with this incident we warn you that Yobit crypto exchange is executing fraudulent activities, and therefore, we advise you to not fall for the swindler’s tricks!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Listing our tokens on Yobit is a scam!  Be careful.  We want to warn you about the fraudulent activities which periodically occurs on the Yobit crypto exchange. Taklimakan Network’s ICO main sale started on 9th of April and will continue for 2 months. On 27th of April we were surprised to see that our token was already added to the Yobit crypto exchange. They put an official post on their twitter account announcing that our token and other tokens like Binance (BNB), LAMBO (LAMBO) and Loom Network (LOOM) are listed on their exchange.   Subsequently, we have appealed to the support service of Yobit crypto exchange, but the answer was never received. On 8th of May the active trade with TKLN tokens began with a daily volume of 127 BTC and a total issue of 1 billion. All our tokens were allegedly transferred to this exchange and were traded at price tens of times cheaper than the price for ICO.  We declare that the Yobit crypto exchange, or someone else, has created a duplicate of our smart contract and has released TKLN fake tokens that cannot be used in the Taklimakan Network ecosystem and accordingly our original tokens cannot be launched on Yobit.  The address of the original Taklimakan Token Smart Contract (TKLN) is 0x0675DAa94725A528b05A3A88635C03EA964BFA7E  We officially declare that our token is not traded on any exchanges and the sale of tokens is made only on the ICO at the moment. In connection with this incident we warn you that Yobit crypto exchange is executing fraudulent activities, and therefore, we advise you to not fall for the swindler’s tricks!

Author: soulcatcher46
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What benefits your tokens will bring for me?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: 1)Subscription to analytical materials and services. The user can use their tokens as a means of payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. 2) Commission fees for using expert strategies. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. 3)Referral and contribution bonuses. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. 4) Vote stake Every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. 5) Membership deposit to access Taklimakan Network news platform. After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.

Author: colennov
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What is infrastructure application level?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: At this level Databases, message buses, and web servers are monitored. Data about health status, activity, and degraded performance is collected. Concrete metrics are defined for each subsystem individually and its purpose and use cases are taken into consideration. Monitoring is conducted with the purpose of reliability and timely service. 3rd party agent applications configured specifically to every object monitored are used to collect metrics

Author: anigmaman
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: hmm system level?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Data about using system resources such as CPU, GPU, RAM, Network resources and channels is collected at this level. Monitoring is done by means of selected management solution for server administration or by means of 3rd party agents for metric collection

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

The monetization of the project is based on a broad spectrum of services that people need to for investment and trading purposes in the cryptomarket. Platform paid services will be priced in fixed amounts of USD and can be purchased for amounts of TKLN equivalent to USD prices according to current exchange rates.

Author: vnedirg
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! I didn't understand what crowd prediction is. What is that?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Author: Drakarchikone
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What will happen if the trust manager collects more or fewer funds than planned?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If the maximum cap is reached before the investment end date, the investment stage is closed and no more funds will be accepted. After investment dates close, investment evaluation happens: If the minimum cap is not reached, funds are returned to investors with no trader commission charged. If the minimal cap is reached, trader may begin trading operations at the trading start date. Some terms in management agreement are automatically enforced by the platform. For example “Cash in if portfolio drawback becomes greater than 10%”

Author: julianlab
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: How can I buy your tokens?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: You need to register on our platform https://tokensale.taklimakan.io , where you can participate in ICO and its stages, deposit funds, buy Taklimakan tokens and find all necessary information. Next, you need to replenish the deposit of your account and receive the procedure of KYC for the withdrawal of their tokens. You will be able to withdraw your tokens to a third-party wallet only after the end of the ICO. We accept BTC, ETH,BCH, XRP, LTC, NEO, DASH, XMR, NEM, ZEC and USD. After purchasing the tokens, you will be able to bring them to your ETH wallet (it should be your personal wallet and exchange wallets (Like Jaxx, Exodus, Coinbase, Poloniex, Kraken, Bitstamp, Bitfinex, Bittrex, and other crypto exchanges) can't be used.) When you pay with cryptocurrencies, the commission fee (transaction fee) is charged by the infrastructure of the corresponding block, the size is set by you, and the transaction speed depends from the congestion of the network and the amount of commission fee that you set.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We decided to use JavaScript with AngularJS framework due to this reasons: 1)Advanced databindings enable modern design patterns such as MVVM and MVP, which provides great flexibility and gives a good choices for architecture design 2) Great performance due to direct operation with DOM and bulk Model/View 3) Ability to create native cross-platform apps if needed 4) Extended features and support

Author: vicklank
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Can you describe the principle of asset and fund management?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: One of the main goals of the platform is to securely connect traders with investors by allowing traders to manage invested funds. First, traders will be able to customize and publish crypto asset management offer on their personal page. Once trader published their offer or multiple offers, investors will be able to find them on the Asset and Fund Management trader search page. If investors like a trading offer, they may choose to invest. The investment process begins with acceptance of management offer. After the management offer is accepted, it becomes management agreement, an investor needs to transfer funds from investor wallet to the wallet that is controlled by the platform. Funds may be transferred within dates defined in management offer

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan Network - a platform that allows any user, who registered an account as an investor, trader, analyst or asset manager, to earn in and out the platform ecosystem. In more detail, consider three cases of interaction between platform users: 1)Investor - Trader. The investor can successfully trade and multiply his capital, by basing his decisions on the recommendations of the traders. The trader receives the proceeds from investors who follow his trading recommendations. 2)Investor - Analyst. An investor can successfully invest and increase his capital by relying on the analysis provided. The analyst receives proceeds from investors for providing professional reports and reviews. 3)Investor - Asset Manager. The investor can successfully receive passive income by putting his capital in the trust management. The trust manager gets the opportunity to receive a constant stream of earnings by attracting capital from investors in the trust management

Author: vaszaitzeff
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What will happen if the trust manager collects more or fewer funds than planned?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If the maximum cap is reached before the investment end date, the investment stage is closed and no more funds will be accepted. After investment dates close, investment evaluation happens: If the minimum cap is not reached, funds are returned to investors with no trader commission charged. If the minimal cap is reached, trader may begin trading operations at the trading start date. Some terms in management agreement are automatically enforced by the platform. For example “Cash in if portfolio drawback becomes greater than 10%.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Today we are glad to present you our new partners - Sandblock!  We have signed a partnership agreement for the mutual promotion of projects on our own marketing channels, with the blockchain project Sandblock!  ""It was a pleasure for me to have a fruitful conversation with Sarah-Diane in Dubai on further collaboration between our projects. We have agreed on to work towards public awareness about our ICOs and promote each other using different marketing channels. Moreover, we believe that Taklimakan Network and Sandblock could mutually benefit from the synergy in terms of research and development and business strategy."" - said our business analyst Berik Yernazar.  You can find more information about Sandblock project by following this link - http://sandblock.io/

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: As traders make trading decisions, the platform will automatically query information about these decisions from the exchange and publish for the investors. Investors will not see all decisions made by the trader, but only decisions related to the portfolios they are invested in. In order to protect a trading secret, trader's decisions will only be published after they have executed on the market. If a decision is canceled, it will not be published.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The cryptocurrency market is at the very beginning of its formation and is very volatile and risky. Individual investors often have lack of experience and analysis tools that are normally used to evaluate projects in traditional segments of the financial market. Independent trading and independent asset management without the experience and knowledge of the market often lead to a loss of invested capital. We are one stop shop with services that might interest all types of market players.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The Taklimakan platform is aimed to empower and attract amateur investors by providing new tools and great knowledge base. Experienced traders and analysts will be encouraged to share their experience and help newcomers to become more efficient in personal fund management. Some Taklimakan innovations will seem new and exciting even to the gurus of investment world because it aims to interconnect social networks, investments, and blockchain, and create a unique and efficient fund management experience for everyone.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: A few days ago, the Taklimakan Network blockchain project was successfully introduced in Hong Kong.  A series of live presentations took place as part of extensive roadshow covering different geographical locations.  CEO of the project Rashid Yussup and Business Analyst Berik Yernazar were presenting the project in front of big audience.  Hong Kong is a special autonomy within the Demographic People Republic of China, which was under colonial rule of British empire for over 100 years  . This aspect forms a completely unique blend of business styles, traditions, and also leaves an imprint on all aspects of Hong Kong's business activity. In just three days, we presented our project to investors from Hong Kong, China, Morocco, the UK and Singapore.  Hong Kong is called the gateway to China. Many Chinese crypto investors act through Hong Kong. And the meetings held by the project attracted investments from this location. Such investment channels will require additional work, but in the end they will surely bear fruit according to team members.  Berik Yernazar successfully delivered a presentation of the project at the international blockcahin conference called ""Financial system and hi-tech: new strategies of investment"", held on April 26 in the start-up center ""The Wave"" in Hong Kong. Visitors from different countries appreciated the presentation approach and contacted with the team for further collaboration opportunities.  Agreements were made to promote the Taklimakan Network project in Asia. The team expects a significant return from Asian investors for its ICO, which officially began on April 9 and will commence on June 9 of this year.  Hurry up to participate in this promising ICO. Details of the project can be found on the official website www.taklimakan.io

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Data Storage choice is dictated to be non-relational due to high level of interconnection between non- homogeneous data such as “user likes user”, “user likes product X”, “comment about product X”, “comment about user”, etc. In order to simplify technology stack, best choices will be universal no-sql databases such as Cassandra, Neo4j, QuasarDB, Tarantool, or HBase. Engine that powers messaging can either utilize functionality of RabitMQ as one of the most direct solutions or be implemented on top of data streaming technologies such as Apache Flume or Kafka.

Author: vi.vir
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What type of DB will you use for IPS and why?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: For the reasons of scalability, data integrity, and transaction support, best DataBase choice for this microservice is one of relational DBs such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MS SQL. This microservice will have average to high load due to number of transactions, and requires good scaling capabilities. For this reason we will utilize data sharding, slicing, and denormalization when we design and configure the DB. Also, SQL based solution is chosen due to reporting capabilities requirement and requirement to integrate with analytical tools.

Author: borutotheson
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What problems do you solve?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: 1)The young, not yet established market of cryptocurrency is not always amenable to technical analysis. Sometimes even a professional trader with an experience cannot determine the medium-term direction and not even the short-term trajectory. 2)Financial education, as well as practice in trading, are prerequisite and necessary for professional trading in with cryptocurrencies. It is required to understand and capture the favorable and unfavorable situation on the market before entering into a directional trade. 3)With the inflow of a large number of people interested in cryptocurrency, a lot of low-quality and fraudulent services appeared in the market offering trading signals, participation in pumps and dumps and in the asset management. As a rule, they mostly do not provide stability and sometimes even lead to the loss of funds. 4)Technical features and inferiority of young and still developing cryptocurrency exchanges, cause certain inconveniences in the trading.

Author: bra.inst
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! I didn't understand what crowd prediction is. What is that?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Author: bra.inst
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Could you tell me some examples of questions for subscribers of Crowd Predictions platform?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Sure, here are some examples for you: "What will be the price of BTC in one week? Will the XYZ ICO reach their goal?"

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Search result will be displayed as a list of analysts in a table, with filtering and sorting capability. Investors and traders can search for Analysts with best reports as well as Analysts with best ratings, as well as for analysts with best aggregated rating (that includes both analyst rating and report rating)

Author: borutotheson
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What is the working principle of Taklimakan Network?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan Network - a platform that allows any user, who registered an account as an investor, trader, analyst or asset manager, to earn in and out the platform ecosystem. In more detail, consider three cases of interaction between platform users: 1)Investor - Trader. The investor can successfully trade and multiply his capital, by basing his decisions on the recommendations of the traders. The trader receives the proceeds from investors who follow his trading recommendations. 2)Investor - Analyst. An investor can successfully invest and increase his capital by relying on the analysis provided. The analyst receives proceeds from investors for providing professional reports and reviews. 3)Investor - Asset Manager. The investor can successfully receive passive income by putting his capital in the trust management. The trust manager gets the opportunity to receive a constant stream of earnings by attracting capital from investors in the trust management.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Our team include more than 17 professional members with years of experience. You can read more information about them on our website : https://taklimakan.io/

Author: coliaun
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What are the trading signals?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Trading signals are the reports that are designed to provide short-term market price forecasts in terms of less than 1 day, which facilitates intraday (high-frequency) trade

Author: coliaun
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: How can you evaluate a particular trading signal?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Trading signals can be evaluated for quality by several factors: 1)Correlation with the price. The signal needs to be correlated with price statistically significantly more than 50% of the time or statistically significantly less than 50% of the time 2)A sample strategy may be provided with the trading signal. Sharpe ratio can be calculated for sample ratio 3)The platform will support the publishing of trading signals, as well as links to external trading signal APIs

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: How can I buy your tokens? What is the payment processing time? What are the fees?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: You need to register on our platform https://tokensale.taklimakan.io , where you can participate in ICO and its stages, deposit funds, buy Taklimakan tokens and find all necessary information. Next, you need to replenish the deposit of your account and receive the procedure of KYC for the withdrawal of their tokens. You will be able to withdraw your tokens to a third-party wallet only after the end of the ICO. We accept BTC, ETH,BCH, XRP, LTC, NEO, DASH, XMR, NEM, ZEC and USD. After purchasing the tokens, you will be able to bring them to your ETH wallet (it should be your personal wallet and exchange wallets (Like Jaxx, Exodus, Coinbase, Poloniex, Kraken, Bitstamp, Bitfinex, Bittrex, and other crypto exchanges) can't be used.) When you pay with cryptocurrencies, the commission fee (transaction fee) is charged by the infrastructure of the corresponding block, the size is set by you, and the transaction speed depends from the congestion of the network and the amount of commission fee that you set.

In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence.
