Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.The TKLN is a utility token, it is not a share or security of any kind, no equity, interests or dividends will ever be distributed or assigned to TKLN holders from the company. Taklimakan does not guarantee any income or profit from TKLN tokens because TKLN tokens are only intended to be used within Taklimakan Network and do not have any value beyond it. Taklimakan does not in any way whatsoever guarantee any income or profit from Taklimakan services and Taklimakan Network.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We have a new partnership, with the CCINT project!  Taklimakan Network and CCINT have entered a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) that will enable us to collaborate on our research and development efforts. MOU will allow both companies to expand product development and marketing capabilities.  Taklimakan Network was conceived as a knowledge portal that provides tools sophisticated enough to attract skilled traders and analysts who are willing to share their knowledge within the ecosystem. CCINT aims to be the go-to platform for accessing immediate media sentiment data and analysis. As with Taklimakan Network, their project is powered by a utility token (also known as CCINT). The CCINT token provides access to current data and a quantitative analysis of sentiment values in the media about various exchanges and tradable tokens. Data is aggregated using their unique natural language processing technology, which is then quantified to deliver a range of data feeds with the lowest latency rates possible. Token holders will be able to bid on the lowest latency feeds, while delayed feeds will eventually be available for anyone to access.  The MOU was signed by Taklimakan Network and CCINT in order to lay out a framework for collaboration, since both companies’ research and development programs aim to address various trading signals applied to blockchain technology. We further along our start-up roadmap, as we have launched our ICO, as well as a demo version of our platform. Our CEO and co-founder, Rashid Yussup welcomes this new relationship with CCINT, which is a platform that dovetails perfectly with the aims of his company’s overall project. “Taklimakan Network is being developed so that anyone anywhere can become a player in the cryptocurrency economy,” he says. “Our strategic relationship with CCINT will help us to expand the offering for our top-skilled expert community members in terms of low latency media sentiment and analysis. For our part, we are working to create an audience of traders and investors who will search out tools like CCINT’s in order to increase their trading success.”  Bram Stalknecht, CEO CCINT.IO, says that he is pleased to collaborate with the Taklimakan Network. “The Taklimakan Network provides true value to its user base by bringing in the wisdom of the trading crowd, while limiting risk in this volatile market”, Bram says. “CCINT’s unique sentiment signal provides additional trading knowledge, before the market moves.”  CCINT plans to launch their ICO later this year. You can find out more about the project and its token sale at ccint.io

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Event monitors will be running in this microservice in order to record events emitted by blockchain smart contracts that are relevant to the functionality of the platform. Events will be recorded in an SQL database. Also, events will be communicated to other microservices that will be able to subscribe to these events via streaming modules such as RabitMQ, Flume, or Kafka.

April 25-26th Vilnius, Lithuania ""Crypto Capital World Summit""  The event will incubate a meeting of traditional investors, regulators, marketeers, cryptocurrency investors and blockchain startups to understand each others areas of work in more detail and discover how synergies between them can be identified and achieved. Our advisor Alexander Mitrovich will represent Taklimakan Network project as speaker.  April 26th Zug, Switzerland ""Blockchain Summit Crypto Valley""  A new year – and blockchain continues to grow and expand around the world, changing business and spurring new innovation. The 2nd Blockchain Summit – Crypto Valley focuses on the intersection of enterprise and startup approaches to building new things with distributed ledger technology. Our chief analyst Bojan Trivic will present our project as a speaker.  You can find more information about conferencies at this links: https://www.cryptocapitalworld.com/ https://blockchainsummit.ch/events/zug-2018

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The withdrawal amount is calculated using the following formula: 1)At the time when trading starts, investors' stakes in the portfolio are calculated using current conversion rates 2)At the time of withdrawal, trader's commission is transferred to trader's address and platform fees are transferred to platform address 3)The remaining amount is distributed between investors proportionally to their stakes at the beginning of trading so that investors share gains or losses proportionally to their investment in trader's portfolio

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: #Taklimakan #Network #participates in #Blockchain Expo Global 2018, the world’s largest blockchain #conference & exhibition, which will be held in #London! Blockchain Expo, the leading global established blockchain for #business #event, will be arriving at London’s Olympia on 18-19 April 2018, bringing together industry leaders for two days of world-class content from leading brands embracing and developing cutting edge blockchain technologies. Blockchain Expo is expected to attract over 6,000 dedicated blockchain delegates over the two days.  Presented in a series of top-level keynotes, interactive panel discussions and solution-based case studies with a focus on learning and building partnerships in the emerging Blockchain space, Blockchain Expo will explore the industries that are set to be absorbed the most by this new technology, including;  manufacturing, retail, financial services, legal, healthcare, insurance, energy, music, government, real estate and more.  Our adviser Alexander #Mitrovich will represent the Taklimakan Network #project, to explain in detail's connection between the #platform and the blockchain technology. Alexander will perform on the 2nd day, April 19th. We look forward to seeing you there!  You can find more information about the conference here - goo.gl/WgNcFR

Author: zulkarnaen
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello dev,, please tell me about education material (a part of your feature), How the implementation of this feature? And what a difference between Analytics and Crowd predictions. I am confused to understand it. Thank you

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello!  Experienced users may publish their education materials such as articles, lessons, or courses or organize webinars. Platform will contain all materials and will facilitate course and webinar schedules. This knowledge base will be continuously supported and expanded by platform moderators, as well as educators. There will be free and paid educational materials. Paid materials will be available to subscribers similarly to analytics. Educators will be rewarded in TKLN tokens for every paid subscriber. Educators will have capability to limit access to their articles to only paid subscribers.  Crowd predictions - users' voting for succes of some project or some cryptocurrency's cours in the future. Those who voted correct will be rewarded.   Analytics section will contain analyst database and allow searching and filtering of analysts by certain attributes such as rating, their investment products/tools. Search result will be displayed as a list of analysts in a table, with filtering and sorting capability. Investors and traders can search for Analysts with best reports as well as Analysts with best ratings, as well as for analysts with best aggregated rating (that includes both analyst rating and report rating)

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on their accounts.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We decided to use JavaScript with AngularJS framework due to this reasons: 1)Advanced databindings enable modern design patterns such as MVVM and MVP, which provides great flexibility and gives a good choices for architecture design 2) Great performance due to direct operation with DOM and bulk Model/View 3) Ability to create native cross-platform apps if needed 4) Extended features and support

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We would like to remind you what is #Taklimakan #Network. What is the working principle of Taklimakan Network?  Taklimakan Network - a #platform that allows any user to earn inside and outside the platform #ecosystem. We strive to create an inclusive environment for communication between #investors, #analysts, and #traders.   Consider three cases of interaction between platform users:  Investor - Trader. The investor trades and multiplies his #capital, by basing his decisions on the recommendations of the traders, while traders receive the proceeds from investors who follow his trading recommendations.  Investor - Analyst. An investor can successfully invest and increase his capital by relying on the analysis provided. The analyst receives proceeds from investors for providing professional reports and #reviews.  Investor - Asset #Manager. The investor can successfully receive passive income by putting his capital in the trust #management. The trust manager gets the opportunity to receive a constant stream of earnings by attracting capital from investors in the trust management.  Find out more on our website - https://taklimakan.io/

Author: anigmaman
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: according yr documentation investors will be able to monitoring my decisions (as trader) in real time. it can be useful for your platform and community, but i want to make decisions in private. How do you explain this?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: As traders make trading decisions, the platform will automatically query information about these decisions from the exchange and publish for the investors. Investors will not see all decisions made by the trader, but only decisions related to the portfolios they are invested in. In order to protect a trading secret, trader's decisions will only be published after they have executed on the market. If a decision is canceled, it will not be published.

Author: vnedirg
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Very interesting project! But I would like to know yr db decision. You will have to handle huge amounts of transactions and constantly scale. How will you overcome these difficulties?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The best DataBase choice for this microservice is one of relational DBs such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or MS SQL. This microservice will have average to high load due to number of transactions, and requires good scaling capabilities. For this reason we will utilize data sharding, slicing, and denormalization when we design and configure the DB. Also, SQL based solution is chosen due to reporting capabilities requirement and requirement to integrate with analytical tools.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Taklimakan Network - participant of the ""WORLD BLOCKCHAIN FORUM 2018"" in Dubai, UAE  The next milestone of our project's Road Show was the ""WORLD BLOCKCHAIN FORUM 2018"" which was held in Dubai during April 16th and 17th. ""Investments and ICO's"" was the main agenda of the event. It is worth noting the special status of the forum, which brought together many promising projects and speakers. The commitment of Dubai to invest in its future and allocate resources for blockchain technology makes the city an ideal place for the meetings and discussions related to the crypto industry. The city offers a unique opportunity to connect with leading CEOs, founders, innovators and investors involved in the crypto world. Famous figures of the industry, like Vitalik Buterin, John McAfee, Brock Pierce, etc. were speakers of the event. The Taklimakan Network team including project's CEO Rashid Yussup and COO Rustam Kairy together with business analyst Berik Yernazar held a number of meetings with investors and new potential partners. Our project received many positive feedbacks and participants marked the useful and interesting idea of the platform, which also carries a social character. It was noted that such platform will guide the beginners and help them to avoid making risky actions as well. The Road Show continues, then we go to the ""Blockchain Expo Global 2018"", which will be held in London on April 18th and 19th.

Author: vicklank
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Do the tokens comply with ERC20 standard? Can I transfer them to a third-party ETH wallet?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! Taklimakan token (TKLN) complies with ERC 20 token standard, you can transfer your tokens to any Ethereum wallet, but it's important to remember that they need support ERC 20. Also, ETH wallet should be your personal wallet and exchange wallets (Kraken, Bittrex, Coinbase) can't be used.

Body: São Paulo, Brazil The «Taklimakan Network» #project has been successfully presented in Latin America, the Brazilian São Paulo. From April 11th to the April 14th, the #project CEO Rashid #Yussup and business analyst Berik #Yernazar held a series of #meetings with Brazilian investors and successfully represented the #project at the international #conference «Plataformas Blockchain como o modelo moderno de investiment». Brazil is the Latin America's largest country and #economy. The country is far ahead of its neighbors in terms of GDP, being the main #economy in Mercosur, and São Paulo is one of the largest cities in the world. The Brazilian audience greeted the «Taklimakan Network» very well. The country clearly wants to increase the level of #financial #literacy and #investment skills in the #crypto-industry. Therefore such #project as «Taklimakan Network» is necessary for both novice and well-established #investors. Promising agreements were reached on the #project expansion in Latin America. The intentions of large Brazilian #investors for the ICO were noted as well. Join us and find out more about the project on our website - https://taklimakan.io

Author: choojoy
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The first professional digital rating agency DigRate has assigned 5.0 points out of 7.0 to the Taklimakan Network.  Taklimakan Network is an investment educational platform for interaction of traders, investors, analysts, and managers through the channel of communication between beginners and experts. The main services of the platform include the following: a social network for crypto community professional and beginner members; aggregation of general information and news on cryptocurrencies; the analytical center where analysts conduct analysis of the crypto market and ICO projects; education center with a library for professional development; trading instruments consisting of trading signals, strategies and recommendations from the platform traders; investment pools with an integrated rating system for managers; collective forecasting (collective voting system); the intra-platform payment system.  The launch of the platform alpha version for testing is scheduled for April-June 2018, according to roadmap. The project’s GitHub page contains the code of the smart contract for the crowdsale. Information about the independent safety audit of the smart contract is missing in official sources of the project.  Part of the team responsible for the development has more than 10 years of experience. Its members are representatives of the company UseTech, that is listed on the Taklimakan Network project's website. UseTech has implemented solutions for a number of large and well-known Russian companies in its portfolio.  The only means of payment within the Taklimakan Network is the ERC20 TKLN token. Participants will be able to pay for subscriptions to analytical materials, trading signals, and strategies or individual expert advice with the help of TKLN. In addition, TKLN owners will have the opportunity to vote for innovations introduced on the platform.  All funds received from the TKLN token sale will be placed on escrow accounts and transferred to the team in accordance with the roadmap, that will limit the risks for investors.  Taklimakan Network is implemented in highly competitive promising fields of crypto trading and investments in cryptocurrency portfolios and ICO projects. The main feature of the project is the complexity, simplicity and variability, that will ensure the functionality of the platform. The launch of MVP is scheduled for April-May 2018. Professionals and newcomers will have motivational incentives for effective interaction within the project. The legal structure of the company is transparent, and the use of an escrow is realized to reduce investment risks. The main disadvantage is the incomplete competition strategy, that can become critical for further development in a highly competitive field.  More information about the strengths and weaknesses of the project can be found in our review: https://digrate.com/uploads/investment_overview/Taklimakan_ER_eng.pdf

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The first phase of the Taklimakan Network global roadshow has successfully completed.  The team spent four days in the city-state, from the third to the sixth of April. During these dates, a number of important meetings with the field professionals, associations and private investors were held. The CEO of the Taklimakan Network Rashid Yusup and Business Analyst Berik Yernazar presented the project and then had a comprehensive discussion with the investors. Eddie Lee, Vice President of the Singapore Fintech, said that the Taklimakan Network project is at the start, and much remains to be done, but its significant potential is noticeable already. The project definitely has grabbed an attention of Singaporean investors, many of whom also represent the interests of crypto-investors from neighboring countries. They said that Taklimakan platform can become a leader in the area. Also, the team successfully presented the project at the Modern Investment with Blockchain Platforms international conference in the Singapore Financial Center. Specialists from Singapore, the USA, China, Malaysia, India and Russia attended the event as well. The next stage of the Taklimakan Network global roadshow will be completed in Seoul, South Korea.

Representatives of Achain and Linker Coin projects take part in the event as well, It is worth to mention that Taklimakan Network and Linker Coin agreed to be a Diamond sponsors of the conference. Again, let us wish good luck to our speaker Berik Yernazar and stay tuned for the new awesome updates.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: 1)Subscription to analytical materials and services The user can use their tokens as a means of payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. 2) Commission fees for using expert strategies To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. 3)Referral and contribution bonuses Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. 4) Vote stake Every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. 5) Membership deposit to access Taklimakan Network news platform After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.

Author: cantap
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What exactly will I own after the token purchase? A company’s share?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN will be used as payment for the subscription to analytical materials released by Taklimakan Network experts and also get full access to the materials, lectures and practical lessons of the education center. To acquire an access to trading strategies, the user must pay a commission for using a ready-made solution and analyst's advice. Platform participants will be able to additionally earn tokens by participating in referral program and receive bonuses for content and offers in the local CPA network. Also, every member of the network that has TKLN tokens on their account has the right to vote for innovations within the platform. Finally, After the end of the trial period, the access to news and materials will be accessible to the users that have a certain number of TKLN tokens on the their accounts.The TKLN is a utility token, it is not a share or security of any kind, no equity, interests or dividends will ever be distributed or assigned to TKLN holders from the company. Taklimakan does not guarantee any income or profit from TKLN tokens because TKLN tokens are only intended to be used within Taklimakan Network and do not have any value beyond it. Taklimakan does not in any way whatsoever guarantee any income or profit from Taklimakan services and Taklimakan Network

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: You need to register on our platform, where you can participate in ICO and its stages, deposit funds, buy Taklimakan tokens and find all necessary information. Next, you need to replenish the deposit of your account and receive the procedure of KYC for the withdrawal of their tokens. You will be able to withdraw your tokens to a third-party wallet only after the end of the ICO. We accept BTC, ETH,BCH, XRP, LTC, NEO, DASH, XMR, NEM, ZEC and USD. After purchasing the tokens, you will be able to bring them to your ETH wallet (it should be your personal wallet and exchange wallets (Like Jaxx, Exodus, Coinbase, Poloniex, Kraken, Bitstamp, Bitfinex, Bittrex, and other crypto exchanges) can't be used.) When you pay with cryptocurrencies, the commission fee (transaction fee) is charged by the infrastructure of the corresponding block, the size is set by you, and the transaction speed depends from the congestion of the network and the amount of commission fee that you set.

Author: zontik232
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Thank you, it's quite clear know, but what about situation when the trust manager collects more or fewer funds than planned?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: If the maximum cap is reached before the investment end date, the investment stage is closed and no more funds will be accepted. After investment dates close, investment evaluation happens: If the minimum cap is not reached, funds are returned to investors with no trader commission charged. If the minimal cap is reached, trader may begin trading operations at the trading start date. Some terms in management agreement are automatically enforced by the platform. For example “Cash in if portfolio drawback becomes greater than 10%.

But we have very promising project, extremely experienced team, and it is very likely that the token's price will increase. Also TKLN token will be supported by constant stream of revenue from Taklimakan platform. Platform paid services will be priced in fixed amounts of USD and can be purchased for amounts of TKLN equivalent to USD prices according to current exchange rates. Portion of paid services payments will be spent to pay service providers such as analysts, traders, signal providers, etc.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Alexander Mitrovich is a IT Executive with over 15 years of managerial experience in Global Technology Services and an entrepreneur who built several successful small and medium size international businesses. Blockchain enthusiast since 2015, Alexander builds the Blockchain Practice and runs Global Operations at USEtech, a 250+ person Software Development company. Having a MS in Engineering, and an MBA, as well as completing TGM Executive Education at INSEAD, Alexander started his IT career with FAME (now Sunguard) in New York. After that he was part of the Management team that built Luxoft (NYSE:LXFT), one of the largest Software Development companies to come out of Eastern Europe by serving top-tier Investment Banks like UBS and Deutsche Bank, Manufacturing and Energy companies. Prior to joining Usetech, Alexander created several EdTech startups and ran an IT consultancy.

Author: zontik232
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Can you please describe the principle of Asset and Fund Management?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! One of the main goals of the platform is to securely connect traders with investors by allowing traders to manage invested funds. First, traders will be able to customize and publish crypto asset management offer on their personal page. Once trader published their offer or multiple offers, investors will be able to find them on the Asset and Fund Management trader search page. If investors like a trading offer, they may choose to invest. The investment process begins with acceptance of management offer. After the management offer is accepted, it becomes management agreement, an investor needs to transfer funds from investor wallet to the wallet that is controlled by the platform. Funds may be transferred within dates defined in management offer.

At the moment we are in the active development process of the alpha version of the platform, and there are already ready prototypes.   Please, stay tuned in our telegram chats and other social networks, as well as in this thread.  In the nearest future, important news about our platform will be announced.

Author: hagubre
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! I didn't understand what crowd prediction is. What is that?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! Platform will organize crowd wisdom to predict prices of certain cryptocurrencies or ICO performance for its users. In order to use this service, users may subscribe to it on monthly or annual basis. Major feature is method of estimate and rewarding user competence. Subscribers will be regularly asked questions about their subjective opinion on a cryptocurrency, an asset price or ICO performance. This prevents guessing game using mathematical statistics and reward use of deeper market knowledge.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Last month, Rakesh Kirpalani, a Dubai-based businessman and investor, joined the company Taklimakan Network as an adviser. Taklimakan Network is a platform created on blockchain  that was developed as a tool for investors, traders and enthusiasts with any level of crypto experience, who want to learn how to make informed choices about the cryptocurrency market. In this interview with Mr. Kirpalani, we discuss his background in investing and advising startups, along with his thoughts on blockchain technology and conducting ICOs. You can see the full interview at this link - goo.gl/3C7MpL

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: You already have some positive crypto-investment experience and are going to scale your projects? Be careful, no one is immune from mistakes. But still, knowing the basic principles mistakes can be avoided. Speacialist in analytics Kyle Proto conducted a detailed analysis of cryptomarket, revealing several key areas where traders make cognitive distortions in thinking. 1) Accessibility heuristic refers to a process in which a trader assesses a situation depending on how easily such situations appear or pop up in memory. 2) The anchor effect, or binding effect, lies in the fact that in the process of assessing the situation, especially when it comes to numerical values, traders "tie" their opinion to some estimates that were obtained earlier. 3) Bias of confirmation. Traders tend to encircle and limit themselves only with information that would confirm their own view. These prejudices deprive new investors of the opportunity to make an objective assessment of the market reality and do not allow to take into account all important aspects of the current situation. 4) The error effect, the player is often faced with in gambling, sports, business and even in everyday life. This effect reflects a widespread misunderstanding of the randomness of events. According to the player's mistake, people will unjustifiably overestimate the probabilities of random events, which "have not been there for a long time" 5) The illusion of control is expressed in the tendency of investors to believe that they can somehow influence the events taking place in the market, which objectively do not depend on them or depend to a much lesser degree.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Last time we talked about the main mistakes beginner investors tend to do. Now, let's discuss several lifehacks which will help newcomers minimize their risks. Before investing in a promising project or currency- make a careful investigation: 1) White paper. The mission, goals and project main objectives  Assess its actual value in the market. 2) The team. Study the project's whole team, find out what kind of specialists they are. What kind of experience and reputation they have in the market. 3) Advisors. Another important component of the team is its advisers. Make the same research for them. 4) Study the project listings and ratings, read articles about it on third-party resources. If there is not much information- the team professionalism could be doubted. 5) Listen to yourself. Why do you want to invest in this project? Is this an impulsive decision? Did you just like the project or your decision is based on a solid research for all of the 4 points?  And the most important question is whether this investment will benefit you. Of course, luck is also an important aspect of an investing, but it is careful analysis and logic which significantly increase the chance of it. #blockchain #cryptocurrency #bitcoin #ethereum #ICO #trading #Taklimakan

Body: Hello! We have only minimum purchase amount - 10 USD. Maximum purchase amount - no limit.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What is TKLN token? Today we decided to shed some light on a slightly difficult topic – the use of TKLN token on our platform. Token TKLN is our own internal currency and an asset, which any prospective member can receive at this stage by investing into Taklimakan Network. TKLN will be central in the functioning of the platform – members will use them to pay for subscription to analytical materials and forecasts, commissions for services. Every network participant who has TKLN token on their account will be able to vote for new analytical tools. Any user can send these tokens to other members and receive them as payment. Besides, experts sharing their knowledge will be rewarded in tokens TKLN.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Hello! We glad that you are interested in our project. It is difficult to say, that this analisis represents the unadulterated truth, because any estimation is partly biased. But we can tell you, that we have a very promising project and extremely experienced team. The simplicity of use, modern design solution, and convenient functionality make the Taklimakan Network platform an indispensable assistant for individual investment in crypto assets. The main features of our project are:Private messaging, Internal payment system, Assigning ratings to experts, Commenting, Search system. Few words should be said about out team. Our team is extremely experienced. Our founders are: Rashid Yussup - https://www.linkedin.com/in/rashid-yussup-4457b749/, Rustam Kairy - https://www.linkedin.com/in/rustam-kairy-3907a114b/, and Yong Ming Hong- https://www.linkedin.com/in/yong-ming-hong-4a9050151/. Most of our team members have more than 10 years experience. You can find out more about our team, advisors and project itself on our website - https://taklimakan.io/

And much more - each of the elements has its own meaning and represents the investor, the trader, the analyst. They are all united by the Taklimakan platform. The visualization of this idea of association and communication is a new logo.The platform  is continuously  improving, hence watch out and join us!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: With the popularity of cryptocurrencies, the issue of financial awareness becomes extremely acute, as the involvement in various investment projects should be based on a qualitative knowledge base, investment experience and the ability to use analytical and trading tools. However, most people make irrational investment decisions by relying on their own intuition and emotions basing them on posts in social networks, friend advice or fake news. Therefore, the main mission of the Taklimakan Network project is to increase the financial literacy and skills of the platform participants, as well as the analyst pools, cryptocurrency advisers, and individual investors to realize investment ambitions at the professional level. For this purpose, we form a whole educational center on our platform that will help to significantly increase the level of knowledge about the cryptomarkets and the opportunity to receive mentor advice with using cryptocurrency exchanges i.e gain financial benefits whilst learning at the same time. These features will be available to all users very soon, please follow our updates!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: To buy or not to buy? Perhaps now there is not a single person left who does not know what a cryptocurrency is and at least once was bothered by this question. On the other hand, a study by Citigate Dewe Rogerson showed that more than half of those who have already invested in cryptocurrency are planning to buy more. This trend prevails despite the strong instability of the market and a huge chance of "burning away" because of the inexperience. In general, one-third of respondents are confident in the strong growth of the crypto investment market, 18% believe that there will be a slight increase, and another 28% predict a decline. But nevertheless, all these people keep buying, selling and do not intend to stop. And what do you think?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: On March 12th, Thomson Reuters, one of the largest media companies and a leader among suppliers of financial analytics for business and state corporations, announced the launching of a new service which will monitor the current mood in the bitcoin market. The official statement says that the company is going to use artificial intelligence to analyze more than 400 sources of information about bitcoin: news sites, forums and social networks. As a result of the analysis, reports will be prepared on the investor sentiment at the moment.  This indicator is already included in the latest version of the service for investment analysis of MarketPsych Indices. The developers are sure that the new service will allow cryptotraders to use rumors and moods on the market to come up with their own profitable trading strategies. We believe that this is a big step towards introducing cryptocurrencies to the world economy.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: While the leading world economies and governments are deciding what to do with the rapidly growing interest in the cryptocurrency, paradoxical news comes from Ukraine. Recently, UkrPochta began accepting Bitcoin, Litecoin and Bitcoin Gold for payment. Therefore, now Ukraine citizens have the opportunity to pay for newspapers and magazines subscription both by classic methods of payments and with the help of cryptowallets directly at the post offices. We do not know how popular this form of payment will be, however, this initiative perfectly shows how fast the usual world can change.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The main goal of the educational center created on the basis of the Taklimakan Network platform is to increase the level of literacy in the cryptoindustry and to teach users practical trading skills. Each user will be able to select a cryptoinvestment mentor, take a course of webinars and lectures. A full access to the blockchain technologies library, description of various capital investing methods and trading instruments in the cryptomarket will be provided as well. The materials of the educational center will be structured and distributed according to the knowledge level of the user and the goals of the educational process. In addition, the platform will stimulate the creation of video lectures where particular trading tools will be described. Qualified and experienced users will be able to provide author's content, training materials, articles, individual consultations, master classes and webinars for users from different countries, receiving a reward in TKLN tokens. Thus, we create a unique educational base that will benefit both beginners and experienced traders. Would you like to have an access to it?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Why did we create the Taklimakan Network? Observing the fantastic start of ICO projects and plunging into the world of crypto investment, our team felt a strong demand for a platform that would help solve the most obvious problems of the market professionals. Usually, investors make decisions based on data from different sources, where information can vary significantly. There are no analytical tools or qualitative reviews on the market - all analysis is done "in manual mode". Large funds create internal analysis tools that are closed to third-party market players, thereby significantly increasing their profits. At the same time, because of a large amount of fraud in the market, financial advisers and traders themselves spend a lot of resources and time on building a good reputation and attracting subscribers. Existing crypto industry platforms complicate the investment process and have an inconvenient service of funds withdrawal and depositing. Moreover, hackers are constantly finding new breaches in security systems. Our platform was created to solve these problems. We strongly believe that a transparent system of evaluation and ratings for productive and safe operation will be established on the platform. Join us and get only the verified data!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Crypto investment is a time-consuming process with many built-in risks. Most of the difficulties arise due to the pure development of the crypto exchange platforms, low awareness of the crypto investors and their basic inability to use trading and analytical tools. Crypto market still is at an early stage of development and investors often act irrationally. They follow unreliable sources of information and superficial judgments of other market players. In some cases, investors do not even use trading and financial instruments for statistical analysis of crypto assets. It is difficult for a rational investor to find a quality source of information about the crypto market. Financial analysts and experienced traders spend a lot of resources and time on transaction costs and costs associated with the formation of reputation and finding subscribers for analytical materials. Taklimakan Network Platform solves all these problems, combines real experience and tools, gives an opportunity to learn and communicate with market professionals. Join us, join the community of professionals!

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

By July 2018, we are about to finalize the development of the beta version and mobile application.    Taklimakan has signed an agreement with ICOBox, the preeminent provider of SaaS solutions for conducting ICOs, to receive their technical, legal, and marketing services.  Also among our partners, such campaigns as CFTI, USE TECH, Central Asia Investments.

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: The development of a truly high-quality platform takes time. But at the moment the first prototypes of the alpha version of the platform are already ready, and in the near future the alpha version will be ready, and in July 2018 a beta version and mobile application should be ready. Thank you for your question!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: What is the project-based method of teaching and what it's fundamental difference from classical education? Acceleration of the modern rhythm of life, scientific and technological progress, constant information update challenges existing system of education and requires new methods for obtaining the relevant skills here and now. The ability to apply a new skill immediately makes training much more effective. The refusal of standardization and movement towards the actual training are the new vectors of education. Opportunities for such training are provided by Taklimakan Network platform. Collegiality and ability to select a mentor, work on real projects and tasks which need to be solved in real time - all these help to gain unique experience and skills in the shortest possible time. After all, as you know, the experience is the best teacher. Join us and you will have an opportunity to get real training from professionals!

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Now, let's take a look at some analytics: for the first two months of 2018, about fifty ICO passed around the world. In total, they have already collected $1.16 billion of investments. Analysts note that the instability of the crypto market and frequent fraud, in general, did not have a negative impact on the results of the ICO. And our team is very happy about this. We think that good and worthy projects should not suffer from dishonest businessmen. Experts predict, in case of maintaining the current trend, ICO market will be able to attract a total of more than $ 7 billion by the end of the year. Whereas, some analysts believe that this amount may be much higher. Overall, the results of the primary placements of the tokens will depend on the formation of the regulatory framework in the European Union, the United States, and other key regions of the world. And what do you think, will the growth of ICO projects continue?

Author: fijiral
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We would like to announce the great news - Taklimakan has signed up a partnership deal with ICOBox, the preeminent provider of SaaS solutions for conducting ICOs, to receive their technical, legal, and marketing services. Based in Singapore, Taklimakan Network is a business platform that aims to connect, equip and train cryptocurrency investors, traders, analysts, and enthusiasts at any level of expertise.ICOBox’s co-founder Mike Raitsyn pointed out that “The Taklimakan Network will provide a space for individuals and industry experts to synergize and cooperate in ways that we are only beginning to imagine. We at ICOBox are very excited to be working with Taklimakan Network.”

If you have any questions, please reach out to us in the Official TAKLIMAKAN NETWORK Telegram: https://t.me/taklimakan_en Email: info@taklimakan.io  Best regards, The Taklimakan Network Team

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We currently have no plans to burn tokens (except those dedicated to ICO and not sold), demand should be more then enough to have a strong token. Our supply is limited (fairly low hard cap), there are multiple revenue streams where people will need to buy tokens. We can always change that and do a burn, but see no need to promise that. Hope that's truthful enough

Author: Minecache

Author: Marvell1
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: May be there will be some kind of quarterly/annually devidents? But frankly I didn't noticed anything about it in WP. It's very important question for investors in my opinion.

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: TKLN is not a security, it is a utility token. Therefore, there can not be any dividends. Any project promoting dividends (without proper security registration) will be at some point declared a security by its jurisdiction and probably closed under the weight of legal costs. To insure long and prosper life of our project, we can not comment on its value as an investment.

Author: Marvell1
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Thank you for the clarification. It's very valuable information that very often doesn't mentioned by many projects which propose dividents.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We thought about that in our design deliberations a lot, actually. We can go AirBnB route and try to be smart (they block phone numbers, email addresses and actual addresses in their internal communication tools. Or, more likely, will focus on building smart services that can't be easily replicated with one text message. Probably the later. We will work with Analysts and Traders to see what can be done in both directions. But most likely lower value-add services (that can be copied in a simple text message or in a photo of the screen) will be made free, and they will charge for higher value added services (for example the APIs to automate trading decisions for our clients based on proven trading signals). Plus, blockchain is built on open systems, and it should work like one. We are disrupting expensive trading businesses, not trying to create a new one. That's our current line of thinking.

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Thanks for your question. As a matter of fact, the main reason Taklimakan engaged us for development is the depth of experience we have in developing similar software. I personally worked for 10 years with top-tier investment banks on high performance trading platforms, systems for Analysts (there's plenty of regulatory complexity there), etc. Feel free to look at my profile via LinkedIn, link is in the team section of the web site. We have a large team (200+ people), part of which will be deployed to create the platform quickly and effectively.

Author: Minor Miner
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: All companies/clients we worked for ask for very strict confidentiality agreements (Blockchain is very different in this respect), so only the info that's in our LinkedIn profiles can be made public, I'm afraid. There's plenty there, though - names of clients (Deutsche Bank, UBS, etc.), including some of the  current Blockchain work (Livetree ADEPT). One project I oversaw was made public by the client so there's no problem with referencing it: http://connection.ebscohost.com/c/articles/25637382/client-first-deutsche-bank.

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: We have a very diverse team, each member brings different experience to the table, including crypto related - trading, software development, marketing, etc. For details please look at the Team section of our web site, as well as provided links to LinkedIn profiles for team members.

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: GitHub will be open to public in a week or so. As for development stage question - we created Requirements and Architecture (parts are published in the WP), and are working on the Design right now - creating infrastructure Microservices that will be used to run the platform. Most of the development work will be done after the ICO, though, as you can imagine.

Author: amitrovich
Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: Indeed, we'll work on this. We will do security planning at the end of Design Phase, and security review before every release. Common practice, nothing special as we will not hold user's funds, so we won't be too attractive target . The only exception is Investment Pools, but even there we won't build anything that will expose users to additional risks (funds are transferred via blockchain into Exchange wallets and back). We will monitor Exchanges to insure they are safe.

Title: [ANN] Taklimakan Network : Social and Business Platform for Crypto Community
Body: As traders make trading decisions, platform will automatically query information about these decisions from the exchange and publish for the investors. Investors will not see all decisions made by the trader, but only decisions related to the portfolios they are invested in. In order to protect trading secret, trader's decisions will only be published after they have executed on the market.
